scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Nativity of Christ, with the Virgin Mary cradling the Christ Child, who is being adored by Saint Joseph. Behind them, two donkeys are present, and a group of onlookers, including angels and possibly shepherds or wise men, observe the event. Above, an angel holds a scroll, and architectural elements suggestive of a stable or a humble dwelling are visible, along with celestial bodies in the background. The overall composition is framed by decorative borders.
